sizing.$description: Optimized spinner size (48px) suitable for both small components like Card and full-page displays

active.$description: Color indicating the active part of the loading.

inactive.$description: Color indicating the inactive part of the loading.

border_radius.$description: Radius LG applied to give the spinner a more organic appearance.

border_width.$description: The spinner border is thick enough to stand out against the busy visual environment surrounding it.

speed.$description: Spinner has continuous rotation with no delay

blur.$description: Background blur on the parent element behind the spinner. Has to be validated.
